statements: SELECT * FROM ProductSales ORDER BY sales_date DESC
SELECT product_name, units_sold FROM ProductSales WHERE revenue > 1000
SELECT AVG(units_sold) AS average_units_sold FROM ProductSales
SELECT product_id, product_name, revenue FROM ProductSales WHERE units_sold > 50 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT product_name, sales_date FROM ProductSales WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31'
SELECT * FROM ProductSales WHERE product_name = 'Product ABC' ORDER BY sales_date DESC, revenue ASC
SELECT product_name, SUM(units_sold) AS total_units_sold FROM ProductSales GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_units_sold DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, sales_date, revenue FROM ProductSales WHERE units_sold > 100 ORDER BY sales_date ASC
SELECT product_name, AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue FROM ProductSales GROUP BY product_name HAVING AVG(revenue) > 500
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM ProductSales ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT report_id, product_id, report_date, demand_quantity FROM product_demand_reports;
SELECT * FROM product_demand_reports WHERE product_id = 100;
SELECT report_id, product_id, SUM(demand_quantity) AS total_demand FROM product_demand_reports GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT report_date, demand_quantity FROM product_demand_reports WHERE demand_quantity > 500;
SELECT product_id, report_date, total_sales FROM sales_trends_reports ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_demand_reports WHERE demand_quantity > 100 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(demand_quantity) AS total_demand FROM product_demand_reports GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_id, report_date, demand_quantity FROM product_demand_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY demand_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS num_reports FROM product_demand_reports GROUP BY product_id HAVING num_reports > 1;
SELECT product_id, SUM(total_sales) AS total_sales FROM sales_trends_reports GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT product_id, demand_quantity, demand_date FROM product_demand;
SELECT product_id, demand_date, demand_quantity FROM product_demand ORDER BY demand_date DESC;
SELECT sale_amount, sale_date, product_id FROM sales_trends WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT report_date, product_id, sale_amount, demand_quantity FROM report_data WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM product_demand WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM product_demand ORDER BY demand_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, demand_quantity FROM product_demand WHERE demand_quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_trends WHERE sale_amount > 500 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, product_id, report_date FROM report_data WHERE sale_amount < 1000 ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, demand_quantity, demand_date FROM product_demand WHERE demand_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity, sale_date FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT report_name, report_data FROM reports
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY category ASC, price DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, s.quantity, s.sale_date FROM customers c JOIN sales s ON c.customer_id = s.sale_id;
SELECT r.report_id, r.report_name, JSON_VALUE(r.report_data, '$.sales') AS total_sales FROM reports r WHERE r.report_name LIKE '%Quarterly%'
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10 AND sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT trend_id, description, start_date, end_date FROM trends ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT sales.sale_id, products.product_name, sales.quantity FROM sales JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
